casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ottis MCGILL 428P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McGill, Ottis.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Melody R. Hairston, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of December 2016 by State of NC to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
